function getLambdaEventSource(event) {<br /> if (event.Records && event.Records[0].cf) return 'isCloudfront';<br /> if (event.configRuleId && event.configRuleName && event.configRuleArn) return 'isAwsConfig';<br /> if (event.Records && (event.Records[0].eventSource === 'aws:codecommit')) return 'isCodeCommit';<br /> if (event.authorizationToken === "incoming-client-token") return 'isApiGatewayAuthorizer';<br /> if (event.StackId && event.RequestType && event.ResourceType) return 'isCloudFormation';<br /> if (event.Records && (event.Records[0].eventSource === 'aws:ses')) return 'isSes';<br /> if (event.pathParameters && event.pathParameters.proxy) return 'isApiGatewayAwsProxy';<br /> if (event.source === 'aws.events') return 'isScheduledEvent';<br /> if (event.awslogs && event.awslogs.data) return 'isCloudWatchLogs';<br /> if (event.Records && (event.Records[0].EventSource === 'aws:sns')) return 'isSns';<br /> if (event.Records && (event.Records[0].eventSource === 'aws:dynamodb')) return 'isDynamoDb';<br /> if (event.records && event.records[0].approximateArrivalTimestamp) return 'isKinesisFirehose';<br /> if (event.records && event.deliveryStreamArn && event.deliveryStreamArn.startsWith('arn:aws:kinesis:')) return 'isKinesisFirehose';<br /> if (event.eventType === 'SyncTrigger' && event.identityId && event.identityPoolId) return 'isCognitoSyncTrigger';<br /> if (event.Records && event.Records[0].eventSource === 'aws:kinesis') return 'isKinesis';<br /> if (event.Records && event.Records[0].eventSource === 'aws:s3') return 'isS3';<br /> if (event.operation && event.message) return 'isMobileBackend';<br />} ç”Ÿæˆéœ€è¦çš„requirements.txt** conda list -e > requirements.txt**
